website_summaries.verdict: With its great display, brilliant camera and attractive, colourful design, the Nokia Lumia 930 has most of what you'd expect from a top-end Windows Phone device. It's battery lets it down though and with an unimpressive selection of apps still available from the Windows Phone store, a high-end Android device with a good camera will likely be a better option for many of you.
pros: The Nokia Lumia 930 has a crisp, bold display that makes Netflix shows look great, its camera is up there with the best and its metal and colourful plastic body will turn at least a few heads
cons: Its battery life doesn't impress, it's quite a chunky beast, Windows Phone 8.1 doesn't come with the Cortana voice assistant outside of the US and the platform still suffers from a mediocre app selection

customer_reviews.title: Best Windows Phone (10/15/2014)
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Windows Phone out there! Plus, at least in my opinion, Windows 8.1 is better than ios and android. It is much easier to sync with your PC and you can actually do more with the windows phones. The camera is awesome, diffidently one of the best. This phone has top notch hardware which it doesn't even need sense the os is so efficient. If you're looking for a Windows Phone, this is the one to go to, as long as you have the money to spend. Otherwise I'd highly suggest going with a mid range Windows Phone. It will still seem pretty fast and fluid.
customer_reviews.author: Coby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome camera, super fast, works great on AT&T in the US.
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome phone. The pinacle of WP 8.1 right now. Love it. #1 feature: Camera. Fast and high quality pictures.I bet this is the best camera on the market now. Easily holding it's own against the best Samsung and Apple has to offer. I've had zero problems using this foreign phone on AT&T (internet, SMS/MMS messages, Internet Sharing, Visual Voicemail, etc.) It all works. I don't miss the LTE in the US at all (HSPA+ is faster than my home internet... so not a problem.)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Peck

customer_reviews.title: All Excelent!!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered in 4 days. Shipping and Handling $6.22 (normal shipping, nothing special selected). Product: 100% recommended. Is made for all windows fans. Came with Windows Phone (WP) 8.1, and will be updated for free to Windows 10. I bought it in $379, and i think was very good price for Apr 16 2015. Work very well !! I'm using it with a 4g plan (LTE) and is very very fast on internet... Youtube HD video load without pause!! 4g is the best!! Advice: Is a Malaysian version. Default in English Malaysian, but i changed immediatly and no problem. Accept a lot of languages, 2 o 3 tipos de Español, several English (USA, UK, etc), Francais, Italiano... etc

customer_reviews.title: 4G LTE vs H+
customer_reviews.text: Hello all,the Nokia lumia 920,930,830 and 820 international versions do not have LTE,only the at&t models and the at&t unlocked models do,i have a lumia 920 international version and a at&t version,only the at&t version has LTE on it,its a awesome phone,but not all models have 4G LTE, H or H+ is 3G,4G LTE and H+ are not the same,there is a big difference in internet speed...
customer_reviews.author: kenny nixon
